verses.name: Lamentations 3:15
verses.text: He hath filled me with bitterness, he hath made me drunken with wormwood.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:16
verses.text: He hath also broken my teeth with gravel stones, he hath covered me with ashes.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:17
verses.text: And thou hast removed my soul far off from peace: I forgat prosperity.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:18
verses.text: And I said, My strength and my hope is perished from the Lord:

verses.name: Lamentations 3:19
verses.text: Remembering mine affliction and my misery, the wormwood and the gall.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:20
verses.text: My soul hath them still in remembrance, and is humbled in me.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:21
verses.text: This I recall to my mind, therefore have I hope.
